A formal dining room adjacent to the living area with sufficient space for luxury dining experiences and social gatherings.
Spare bedroom designed for occasional guests. Includes colonial-style decor and ample closet space.
Dedicated library space with built-in bookshelves and a cozy reading nook, positioned in the northwest corner to enhance concentration as per Vastu.
Service area for household utilities including storage for cleaning supplies and appliances.
